00261 #define PARAM_UART_DATABIT(databit)     ((databit==UART_DATABIT_5) || (databit==UART_DATABIT_6)\
00262 || (databit==UART_DATABIT_7) || (databit==UART_DATABIT_8))
00263 
00265 #define PARAM_UART_STOPBIT(stopbit)     ((stopbit==UART_STOPBIT_1) || (stopbit==UART_STOPBIT_2))
00266 
00268 #define PARAM_UART_PARITY(parity)       ((parity==UART_PARITY_NONE) || (parity==UART_PARITY_ODD) \
00269 || (parity==UART_PARITY_EVEN) || (parity==UART_PARITY_SP_1) \
00270 || (parity==UART_PARITY_SP_0))
00271 
00273 #define PARAM_UART_FIFO_LEVEL(fifo)     ((fifo==UART_FIFO_TRGLEV0) \
00274 || (fifo==UART_FIFO_TRGLEV1) || (fifo==UART_FIFO_TRGLEV2) \
00275 || (fifo==UART_FIFO_TRGLEV3))
00276

00279 || (IntCfg==UART_INTCFG_RLS) || (IntCfg==UART_INTCFG_ABEO) \
00280 || (IntCfg==UART_INTCFG_ABTO))

00284

00287

00290                 (ABIntStat==UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABTO))

00311 /* Macro to determine if it is valid UART port number */
00312 #define PARAM_UARTx(x)  ((((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART0)) \
00313 || (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART1)) \
00314 || (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART2)) \
00315 || (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART3)))
00316 #define PARAM_UART_IrDA(x) (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART3))
00317 #define PARAM_UART1_MODEM(x) (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_UART1))
